word: G755 - ἀρχιτρίκλινος - architríklinos - ar-khee-tree'-klee-nos - Governor of the feast

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Governor of the feast
the superintendent of a dining - room
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G746 and a compound of G5140 and G2827 (a dinner bed, because composed of three couches); director of the entertainment: - governor (ruler) of the feast.
